thread.title: BRIEF-Pfizer Doses First Patient Using Investigational Mini Dystrophin Gene Therapy For The Treatment Of Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy

title: BRIEF-Pfizer Doses First Patient Using Investigational Mini Dystrophin Gene Therapy For The Treatment Of Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy

organizations.name: treatment of duchenne muscular dystrophy reuters

text:
April 12, 2018 / 12:04 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Pfizer Doses First Patient Using Investigational Mini Dystrophin Gene Therapy For The Treatment Of Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy Reuters Staff 
April 12 (Reuters) - Pfizer Inc: 
* DYSTROPHIN GENE THERAPY FOR THE TREATMENT OF DUCHENNE MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY 
* DYSTROPHIN GENE THERAPY STUDY TRIAL ARE EXPECTED IN FIRST HALF OF 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
